feed.title: Request for a new BIP number (and discussion): Improved HD wallet generation.

entry.title: Request for a new BIP number (and discussion): Improved HD wallet generation.
entry.summary: In an email communication on February 21, 2015, 木ノ下じょな thanked Pavol Rusnak for his feedback and mentioned that they have written the Abstract and Motivation. The tone of the email seems to suggest that the feedback was well-received by the sender.
